message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,000,000.  I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $750,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your desire to save, however, the value of this product is significant. I could consider letting it go for $925,000.
I understand the value of the product, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
